column1: '''Sonia Fraser''' is an English radio actress and stage director. During the 1980s
column2: she was part of the [[BBC|National Radio Company]]'s core cast. As such
column3: she voiced the part of [[Arwen]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on BBC 4.
